name: Spellcraft Threshold
description: This exists only because mutation categories for spellcraft scrolls throw out errors without a matching threshold.  This is a bug if you have it.

name: Paragon of The Veil
description: You have gazed deeper into The Beyond than anyone that still lives.  It has gazed back, and found greater purpose in you.

name: Dragonblood
description: Power by any means.  The Sanguine Order believed the Dragonblood Sacrament would make them powerful enough to survive the cataclysm, to rule over man and monster alike.  That you have survived this long just might prove them right.

name: Arcana: Acid Armor
description: Powers from beyond have granted you the power to conjure a mote of energy, that can protect against corrosion.  Activate to focus your power.

spawn_item.message: You focus a fragment of your mind into a magical sign.

name: Arcana: Acid Spray
description: Powers from beyond have granted you the power to conjure a mote of energy, that can create sprays of acid.  Activate to focus your power.

spawn_item.message: You focus a fragment of your mind into a magical sign.

name: Arcana: Agility
description: Powers from beyond have granted you the power to conjure a mote of energy, that can grant a temporary speed-enhancing effect.  Activate to focus your power.

spawn_item.message: You focus a fragment of your mind into a magical sign.

name: Arcana: Clairvoyance
description: Powers from beyond have granted you the power to conjure a mote of energy, that can grant a temporary clairvoyance effect.  Activate to focus your power.

spawn_item.message: You focus a fragment of your mind into a magical sign.

name: Arcana: Clarity of Blood
description: Powers from beyond have granted you the power to conjure a mote of energy that can protect against parasites and the Mycus.  Activate to focus your power.

spawn_item.message: You focus a fragment of your mind into a magical sign.

name: Arcana: Confuse Monster
description: Powers from beyond have granted you the power to conjure a mote of energy, that can confuse nearby monsters.  Activate to focus your power.

spawn_item.message: You focus a fragment of your mind into a magical sign.

name: Arcana: Conjure Lightning
description: Powers from beyond have granted you the power to conjure a mote of energy, that can create a field of electrified air.  Activate to focus your power.

spawn_item.message: You focus a fragment of your mind into a magical sign.

name: Arcana: Conjure Smoke
description: Powers from beyond have granted you the power to conjure a mote of energy, that can create a cloud of obscuring smoke.  Activate to focus your power.

spawn_item.message: You focus a fragment of your mind into a magical sign.

name: Arcana: Conjure Toxic Cloud
description: Powers from beyond have granted you the power to conjure a mote of energy, that can create a cloud of deadly miasma.  Activate to focus your power.

spawn_item.message: You focus a fragment of your mind into a magical sign.

description: Powers from beyond have granted you the power to conjure a mote of energy, that can trigger an uplifting rush through the body.  Activate to focus your power.

description: Powers from beyond have granted you the power to conjure a mote of energy that can protect against corrosion.  Activate to focus your power.
